schema.description: 用于保证请求的幂等性，防止重复提交请求。由客户端生成该参数值，要保证在不同请求间唯一，最大值不超过64个ASCII字符，且该参数值中不能包含非ASCII字符。

RequestId.description:
请求ID。
>仅返回请求ID时，表示数据库名称可用，否则会返回报错信息，提示数据库名称重复或不符合命名规范。

400.errorMessage: Database connect error. please check instance status and database processlist
invalid value, may include special character.
Specified DB name is not valid.
Specified DB name is a keyword in RDS.
Specified DB name already exists in the This instance.
A package instance is not allowed to operate independently.
Pricing plan price result not found.
You have not passed the real-name authentication and do not meet the purchase conditions. Please log in to the user center for real-name authentication.

403.errorMessage: Current DB instance engine and type does not support operations.
Current DB instance state does not support this operation.

404.errorMessage: Current DB instance lock mode does not support this operation.

title: 检查数据库名称是否可用
summary: 该接口用于检查数据库名称是否重复或不符合命名规范。
description:
### 适用引擎

- RDS MySQL
- RDS PostgreSQL
- RDS SQL Server
- RDS MariaDB
